Bash(avird_env/Scripts/python.exe -c "
import os
print(''OPENAI_API_KEY set:'', bool(os.environ.get(''OPENAI_API_KEY'')))
print(''LANGSMITH_API_KEY set:'', bool(os.environ.get(''LANGSMITH_API_KEY'')))

Bash(avird_env/Scripts/python.exe -c "
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, text
import os

# Use local SQLite database
db_url = ''sqlite:///./avird_data.db''
engine = create_engine(db_url)

with engine.connect() as conn:
    result = conn.execute(text(''SELECT COUNT(*) FROM fault_analysis''))
    count = result.fetchone()[0]
    print(f''Total fault analysis records: {count}'')
    
    # Show some sample records
    sample = conn.execute(text(''SELECT report_id, fault_version, is_av_at_fault, av_fault_percentage FROM fault_analysis LIMIT 5''))
    print(''\nSample records:'')
    for row in sample:
        print(f''  Report ID: {row[0]}, Version: {row[1]}, AV at fault: {row[2]}, Fault %: {row[3]}'')
")
